timeline.message:
New assignServices method

* Created new method that can assign multiple services to given
resource.
* I have created new methods on all layers.
* The old method assignService now uses the implementation of this new
method to reuse code.
* I have created unit tests to test all new methods.
* I have added the new method to the openAPI specification.

timeline.bodyText: I believe you want to add result into the attributes list. Also, what if required attributes of passed services overlap? We probably should gather them into the set before returning as list.
timeline.author: zlamalp

replies.bodyText: Yeah, definitely I wanted. I have fixed it and also added a test for this method.
replies.author: Vojtech-Sassmann

replies.bodyText: When I think about it, our equals() include attribute value. So if value of required attribute changes during the consequent calls, we still might get duplicity, which will probably fails some checks. But optimization of impl layer to load all data from DB at once is not a part of this change.
replies.author: zlamalp

timeline.bodyText: We should make sure, that attribute IDs are unique, since they may overlap for multiple services.
timeline.author: zlamalp

timeline.bodyText: Again we should have unique set of attribute ids.
timeline.author: zlamalp
